website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy pedal car that gives young Batman fans a zippy way to tear around their imaginary Gotham.
pros: Can handle a lot of kid-weight – up to 120 pounds
Rubber tires do a better job than hard plastic
Does not take too long to put together out of the box
Child will likely outgrow Batman before outgrowing this pedal car
cons: Works best on paved surfaces and doesn't do as well in the grass as pedal cars with pneumatic wheels

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Came fast. Easy to build took 40min, may be faster without kids asking if it’s done every 5 seconds. Seat not easily adjustable but I like that. My 4 and 7 year olds can fit it on the middle setting just fine a little to big for four year old but he can grow with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a purchase for both of our children. 2 yr old & tall 7 yr old. The seat is adjustable fairly easily so it can go between who is using it. Just as other reviews have stated the batman cover comes off super easily...and it's annoying. The kids have kept it off recently and the front piece where it is clipped is now the little brother ride along spot. His sister puts a pillow down and he chills while she rides him around lol. It's decent quality and the kids love it so that's what counts.
customer_reviews.author: Britt9025kp

customer_reviews.title: As good as it looks!
customer_reviews.text: It took a minute to out together but the instructions were easy to read! I have a very large four year old and he loves it to death! He rides it everywhere! It looks like itll age up really well as it's on the smallest setting, and it seems to handle most terrain okay (if your kid has strong enough legs) Definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: My kid thinks he is the real Batman
customer_reviews.text: Four year old son loves it, uses it daily. Easy to assemble and very solid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breaking not good quality
customer_reviews.text: The front piece break easily it’s not safe I just got it and it’s already broken The front piece break easily it’s not safe I just got it and it’s already broken
customer_reviews.author: Stylist

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This was well worth the price. You have to put it together when you receive it, but my husband and I working together with stickers and manual labor had it finished in 20 minutes. The instructions don’t have words but the pictures are very self explanatory. The wheels are a hard kind of rubber but feel very sturdy and like they will be very durable! I’d have to say that this is one of the best purchases I’ve made in a while, my 6 year old was beyond ecstatic to walk in and see this go cart!
customer_reviews.author: Felisha

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than other pedal cars
customer_reviews.text: This pedal car was purchased as a gift for my five year old Grandson. One of the last pieces put on the car was broken. I tried to call the company to request a replacement part and got a recording stating that I would have to send an email. After looking at other pedal card I discovered this car is much smaller than the "Nerf " pedal car. I am so disappointed? The car looks great but I would say it is not a good value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable nice and sturdy great price
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson for his birthday she absolutely loves this thing it's adjustable so that he can grow into it it rides great it's hard to keep him off of it
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Is good but the front part keeps popping out and my kids gets frustrated while riding it.
customer_reviews.author: noelia

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for 4 yr old.
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to assemble. Just needed a Phillips screwdriver. Took about 15 min. Instructions were very clear except for the steering wheel....it wasn't obvious that the center plastic piece has to pop off to install it. More contrast on that part of the instructions might help. 4yr old nephew has been riding it every day. He loves that it can go backwards (by pedaling backwards). We ended up putting it on the middle notch so he probably will grow out of it before 8 years. He says it is easy to pedal. He hasn't gone fast enough yet to use the hand brake.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: I like how there is 3 adjustable seat settings so he ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sons 4th birthday. He absolutely LOVES it. I like how there is 3 adjustable seat settings so he can grow in to it as well as let his older brother ride it. The only con I found was the plastic batman top, comes off pretty easy. Not a huge issue, we just have to pop it back on quite a bit. I would definitely buy again as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: My son was BEYOND excited to get this for Halloween. He rode all around the neighborhood. He is four and he was able to maneuver it well. The break, is not really for use on hills or things like that. I assembled it myself no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia McGee

customer_reviews.title: Super Deal for Super Fun Cars
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for Christmas. Easy to assemble. It took approx 25 mins each. I assembled the first one by myself. My husband helped with the second one and it took much less time. The boys love riding them and really love the compliments and stares. The only drawback is the front shield pops out of place when bumped against objects. Easy to pop back into place though. The kids like riding them in the park so we have to transport them. Because of the size we have to take them in separate cars. They fit perfectly in the backseat of my husbands car (Nissan Maxima) and in the cargo area of my car (Nissan Murano).
customer_reviews.author: Marlisa Hibbert

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Christmas gift my grandson going to love it.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for shipping it out so fast. It’s will stay in the box until Christmas Eve. I been wanted to get this for sometime. But when I get the money put together it get sold out. This time I got lucky to get it. My little grandson going to love it. I told my daughter Christmas Eve. Her or my son-in-law will have to come up And get me. Then they can put it together at their home A Christmas Eve project . When the kids are in bed. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these "go karts" for our almost 7 year old and almost 5 year old. Assembly was pretty easy and it comes with everything you need to put it together. The kart comes with a 3 position adjustable seat my 5 year old is average height uses the middle setting and has plenty of room to grow. Had i seen this kart before purchasing it I wouldn't have bought one for my 7 year old, he is in the taller side and his seat is set to the last position and although he can still pedal and use the kart I don't think it will be for much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn fun
customer_reviews.text: Go cart came in a big box, assembly required but not complicated. Easy to do and only took a few minutes. Tools were all supplied aside from a Phillips head screwdriver. My kiddos are 3 and 6 and on the middle seat position could bring it in for a someone smaller and also have room to grow. Both were having a great time. I just wish the tires were more rubber. They are the shiney plastic so not much traction.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Co

customer_reviews.title: 5 YEAR OLD LOVES THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our Granson's 5th Birthday, he LOVES IT! Nothing cuter than seeing him in his batman costume riding his batmobile down the street! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Concerned customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for 3 year olds
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 year old loves this!! The assembly was intimidating when I first pulled it all out of the box but, that's because I have no concept of things like this.... having said that, I put it all together by myself, and it works great!! it's durable, fun, and easily maneuverable. I prefer this over any battery operated toy because it keeps their feet moving and lets them have fun exercising.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good car with a problem
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pedal go cart by Hauck a couple of years ago for a vacation home and the grandkids have loved it t, so we bought 3 of these Batman go carts for our grandsons, ages 4, 4, & 5. It is adorable but there is a problem keeping the Batman cover on; my husband drilled small holes and used black zip ties to keep it on which solved the problem, but that's a design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: muskie1

customer_reviews.title: do not recommend. There are better brands out there
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves it, however he will be grown out of this next year already. I find this product a little small for a 5 year old since we had to push the seat all the way back for him to be comfortable. If he bumps on things, what happens a lot, the front keeps falling off and we have to keep putting it back. Its easy but still annoying
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Staples

customer_reviews.title: Great as a parade cruiser—one speed!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is well built and sturdy. If you’re looking for a good block cruiser this is a good selection. We though this would go faster, but cart weight and leg/small pedal rotation makes a low top speed. Design is awesome! To plus up the slow top speed we added in some led lights for night time fun!
customer_reviews.author: Julie K

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Grandkids
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons love this car, it seems durable, as we had it for the last two months of the summer with the only issue being that the plastic shell for the front of the bat car comes off easily while riding for a short period of time. I will figure out something to adhere it to the frame, as I my grands did not want to part with it!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: A Christmas present for our 4 year old and he absolutely loved it! Very well made and seems sturdry although the true test will be when the weather breaks and we can get it outside. The seat adjusts quite a bit so it is definitely something that he won't out of grow quickly allowing for many years of fun and racing! My husband put it together and he said it was not complicated. No missing parts or ill-fitting pieces. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it
customer_reviews.text: The car and frame are sturdy and well built. Great exercise for a 4 year old. The front/top plastic cover does pop off easily if not handled gingerly. Also there is no idle pedal function. It moves as long as he pedals. He can not coast. He stop pedaling and the Kart stops. The next generation of the Kart should have that functionality to make it a true 5 star Kart
customer_reviews.author: RB Sr

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only had it for a few days, but it’s a huge hit. Most of the frame is metal, but the tires and “hood” are plastic. My 4 year old granddaughter is absolutely in love with it. All the other ride on toys, including electric ones, have been abandoned for “the best car ever.”
customer_reviews.author: A. A. Nastold

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than description
customer_reviews.text: Product is far smaller than the description. Also the wheels for far too close to the ground and if your foot is up on the pedal you hit the shield off with your toes. The shield comes off easily but for my son this was the best part and for it to get knocked off by his need or toes every single time he peddled was frustrating. I also didn’t know the item was far too small until it was completely assembled! I wish it was bigger
customer_reviews.author: St.Clair

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for twin 6 year old boys for their birthday. My husband assembled them with no issues, they are durable and the boys loved them. One of them is a peanuts at around 40lbs and road it no problem. I’m 5’2” and about 150 lbs and also road it no problem 🤣. They are super fun and steer really well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a little racer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift! and so far from what I've been able to see handling it (before I wrap it and hide it) it seems truly amazing for the price. The materials are better than expected and it seems very sturdy and durable (but only time will tell). I think my nephew will be very happy with his gift and he'll definitely give it lots of use! :)
customer_reviews.author: Katyusha

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 6-year-old
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son's 6th birthday and he loves it, especially the Batman look and the removable front plate (He treats it like a "hood" and takes it off to pretend fix it). We made assembly an afternoon activity and after a little bit of practice he was flying around in it. Would greatly recommend this vs. an electric ride-on car as it's better for exercise and coordination, a couple steps below a bike speedwise and comparable to a scooter.
customer_reviews.author: Levi W. Holden

customer_reviews.title: Wow, it’s as cool as we thought!!
customer_reviews.text: My son thinks it’s the super coolest thing ever. He was speechless when we gave it to him. It holds up great, but don’t let it get wet in the sprinklers or rain, bc of the stickers. Part of one already got messed up from the car being left in the rain accidentally :/
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Kinsman

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson absolutely LOVES this! I had it shipped to him for Christmas and he had to jump right on it! He even has a Batman costume and had to wear it with his peddle car. My son said that he had to give him a place in the garage to park it! LOL! Best gift ever! This old Nonna got a lot of love Milage out of this gift!
customer_reviews.author: Denise O.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a wild boy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our son's fifth birthday. Years prior we went with battery operated vehicles. All have had to have parts replaced, multiple times. My son rides this batmobile all day!! No tears from a dead battery after 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Raedena Vogler

customer_reviews.title: Age range issue. But great toy for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great product. However, I don’t think they have the correct age range. I bought 2 of these for a 3 and 6 year old. My 6 year old is already growing out of it. I wished that I can extend it longer, but I can’t.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Comes in the Original box- beware
customer_reviews.text: ALMOST ruined xmas and (SANTA) when I arrived home to find the car on my porch with pictures of the car all over the box! Luckily it was dark and I was able to direct my kid into the house through a different way so he did not see it. If it's a surprise be ready when it's delivered! Nice fun toy. Very physical activity for my 4 year old which is great! The front panel pops off with the slightest collision with something- it will snap back on though.
customer_reviews.author: Erin K McDonald

customer_reviews.title: A huge hit with our two grandsons.
customer_reviews.text: A huge hit with our two grandsons. However, the peddle drive does not free-wheel so the peddles keep turning when vehicle is moving risking bruised ankles if kids lift feet and then attempt to reengage.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick S.

customer_reviews.title: NO DECALS
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this early for Christmas.. Just assembled today. There were NO DECALS in the box. This is not cute w ithout the Batman decals. It is plain black. No kid would look twice at it. How can we give this to a little boy for Christmas?
customer_reviews.author: Tumbleweed

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Got it for my son he's 31/2. He freaked out he lover it. He really likes the brake on the side. Great product!! The batman cover pops off if he runs i to something but he's been over bumps and holes abd it's holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: sylvia davenport

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves this Go Kart! Tires and frame seem very sturdy. I gave it 4 stars only because the front panel does pop off if it gets kicked. But it easily pops back on. Don’t let that stop you from buying it.
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Vehicle!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well constructed -- easy to assemble (less than 30 minutes), well packaged. Our 5 year old grandson loves it -- rides it every day! Highly recommend. Great starter 4 wheeler for a 4-7 year old
customer_reviews.author: 40 Year Fan

customer_reviews.title: Good for small  toddlers !
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute , but there’s no way the age on it is accurate . It says 4-8 yrs old . I’d say 3-4 maybe . & when it was delivered it didn’t come w a receipt , so yeah I wasted my money & have to find something else as a gift 2 days before Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Ya'Shica Lee

customer_reviews.title: Need height of child, for this product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for grandson. He just fit it. He is 6, and a tall 6. It is for ages 4- 8 but does not give height of child that would fit it. It is sturdy. He did like it but kept hitting his knees, was extended all the way back.
customer_reviews.author: Tina H

customer_reviews.title: Crash tested and approved
customer_reviews.text: Was super easy for me to assemble on my own and it's very good quality. My son has crashed a few times and it's holding up very well. I do like that the front piece can be snapped on and off so easily
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Super cool kids toy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Bought it for my Godson. He’s going to love it. My daughter tried it out just to make sure it was a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: We bought this car for our 3 year old. It’s a perfect size for him! The tires are very good quality rubber, it drives great on concrete or hard wood floors. So far it’s been very durable. We were trying to find a smaller version of the Hauck Nerf battle racers that came out a few years ago. This one is the same brand and the quality is just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this "go-cart" for my Grandson's 5th birthday. He was so excited that he got a "Batmobile" we couldn't get him off it. I loved giving him so much joy.
customer_reviews.author: Franchesca

customer_reviews.title: The Batman case on the front even doesn’t stay on!!!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had this even for a month and it’s already broken. The Batman case is constantly popping off the front end, and when that happens while riding it, your kid hits it bc they don’t know when it is going to pop off.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Wheel missing a part
customer_reviews.text: The box did not have directions in it and the wheel is missing a piece to keep it on. So the wheel falls off every time and it is not driveable. Since it was a Xmas present, I don’t have the box anymore because I built it before putting it under the tree. Cannot return it and now just stuck with an expensive unusable toy.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Beier

customer_reviews.title: Batman pedal toy! Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is five years old and got this for Christmas and he absolutely adores it! It is sturdy it is everything you could ever want in a pedal toy and it’s Batman!
customer_reviews.author: Christine K. Trease

customer_reviews.title: Pedals are fixed and awkward, go buy lock washers for seat that falls off
customer_reviews.text: Pedals are fixed and awkward, feet slip off them. Difficult to pedal up any incline or any terrain, pedals spin wild downhill. Go buy some lock washers for seat that falls off! Good luck keeping that Batman shield attached
customer_reviews.author: Ontheline

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: My son loved his bat mobile! It definitely is not as sturdy as I would have hoped, the front part keeps falling off, it only snaps onto the frame so it doesn’t stay secured for long. It’s already starting to make a grinding sound when he’s peddling, we only have had it about 2 months now. It’s cute and fun but not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Front Shield Falls Off When Pedaling (won't stay on)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this expensive go kart for my grandson for his birthday. We gave it to him on his birthday in late September. My daughter told me last week that the front of the go kart (shield) doesn't stay on at all when it's being ridden. I wouldn't recommend this item to anyone as after only 1 month, is so not worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: CindyB

customer_reviews.title: My son in law said it was fairly easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandson's 5th birthday. He loves it! He is tall for his age, so I was a little concerned about that, but, need not have worried! I am a happy Nana!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor ride on
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! He did already crack the front of the plastic guard by running into a wall. But the frame, pedaling and steering system seem to be pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: My almost 9 year old is very tall for his age! This had plenty of room for his long legs. It also was very easy to put together. He drives it all over my house!!!! Such a fun toy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Loved this for my nephew. He is autistic and loves batman. He loved it and was easy to use. The only problem with it. As he rides it the front cover likes to pop off alot.
customer_reviews.author: S.dyess

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy broke first yume my son rode it
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give negative stars! My parents had me order this for them to give my son for his Birthday in January. He turned 7. Due to winter weather and flu and cold today was the first time he rode and and it broke! He is heartbroken!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Blackstock

customer_reviews.title: Nice but batman falls off
customer_reviews.text: My 5yo loves his bike only problem is the batman cover pops off everytime he rides it. We just took it off until we can figure out a way to get it to stay on.
customer_reviews.author: A. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, fun to ride!
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, my kids love it. One screw on handle to fasten the seat in one of several adjustable locations broke off during assembly. Its still functional but that was my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathon G

customer_reviews.title: Joker beware!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 4 year old son and he loves it. It's sturdy, although the Batman cover can pop off if messed with but it pops right back on, easy to assemble and just loads of fun to ride.
customer_reviews.author: VNP

customer_reviews.title: too small for 7 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old is average size, he has to splay his knees to keep from hitting the steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: H. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great pedal car!!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old has a blast driving this Batmobile around! Well constructed and seems to be fairly robust.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Jedlicki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as pictured and described! I bought it for my 4yr old son (3'8") for Christmas and he loves it! With the adjustable seat he has no problem reaching the pedals. Was easy to put together and is great quality. Thank you for making my son's Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Fun car.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves his Batman car. He never learned to pedal his trike but the car had him going like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little ride but “hood” pops off often.
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 yr old son is y’all for his age and fits well Into cart. Sturdy and had lasted through many bumps and rolls. The only complaint is that “hood” comes off and won’t stay on long with vibration from concrete. He took it off and rides without it . Brakes work good and easy to control. Our 8 yr old daughter even likes to ride it and it just fits her height.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Melson

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE it.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and really stunning. Even the box it came in was impressive. My grandson loves it and we do too!! Very pleased*****
customer_reviews.author: tukaleechee

customer_reviews.title: Almost too short for 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: Good bike for my 6 year old but i would recommend a younger age he is almost too long for it! Not too bad to put together!
customer_reviews.author: M. Gryga

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little go kart...I would have loved this as a child.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, easy instructions. 5 year old grandson went bananas over it. Great product. Seat is adjustable. Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Buckner

customer_reviews.title: Not made to stand up to a ruff kid
customer_reviews.text: As soon as my son cranked down the driveway the Batman cover pops off. To the point my 5 year old prefers it without it. The frame is sturdy. Wish the tires were not hard. I tried to order a cart with softer tires and the description was deceiving. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Every Batman needs a batmobile!
customer_reviews.text: Very fun! My son got this for Christmas and he loves it. He is 4, 42” and still has plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Best Toy Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This cart is almost indestructible. It us used (not very gently) by both my 3 yr. old and my 14 yr. old grandsons! Best toy I ever bought for them!
customer_reviews.author: Carol M. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: BATMAN
customer_reviews.text: Should have tools included on the package other then that it took about 40 mins to set up and havent had an issue since. Started to use it on 12/25/2019
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Having fun in the sun.....
customer_reviews.text: my nephews love it. seat should have a lever adjust and the front shield should screw on vice snap. overall great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin William

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after 2 days with my 5 year old Grandson.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the way it looked, had someone assemble it. The steering wheel came off and wheel came off after 2 days with 5 year old trying to ride. My husband and I just got back from 255 mile round trip to put is back together. The long rod that attaches the wheels to the steering wheel does not have enough threading to hold tight enough. Needs to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Matney

customer_reviews.title: egh
customer_reviews.text: the plastic hood keeps falling off and its just an ok product
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Built right and easily assembled
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed by the quality of the materials and hardware. Easy to assemble; only took me one drink to get through it. Strong construction, smart design and easy instructions. Best of all, it has 3 seating positions--so it can grow with my son. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Chippewa mama

customer_reviews.title: Bat Mobile Pedal Go Cart
customer_reviews.text: My seven year old grandson loves it. It came in sturdy cardboard packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Paula G.

customer_reviews.title: For my nephew
customer_reviews.text: My nephew absolutely loved it! He enjoys riding it everyday! It was easy to assemble. It could hold an adults weight so very durable .
customer_reviews.author: Myha

customer_reviews.title: my 5 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: He is now 6 and still rides it everywhere. The plastic batman shield on the front comes off all the time, and we clip it back on, but still it is to the point where its somewhat of a joke around the house because its usually sitting in the front yard. A ziptie would fix this easily, just need to do so.
customer_reviews.author: bootzila

customer_reviews.title: My grandson's favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: My five year old grandson and I put this together in a little over an hour. I'm so impressed with how sturdy it is. At 5 years old it fits him perfectly. He just got a new bike but prefers to ride his Bat Mobile!
customer_reviews.author: Teri Wing

customer_reviews.title: Batman!
customer_reviews.text: Great ride for my 3 y/o grandson. That little dude is EXCITED!
customer_reviews.author: yomama

customer_reviews.title: Very popular gift
customer_reviews.text: My Nephew loves it. Sent to him and I get videos showing him enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Mtnsleder

customer_reviews.title: Go Go Batmobile
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 5 year Nephew's birthday, he seems to really like it. It's not much more than a go-kart but the cool factor is the steering wheel so it differentiates itself from a bike and he can zoom around quite fast on it!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: High quality, fun pedal car
customer_reviews.text: I got this pedal car for my 5 yo. Needless to say, he LOVES this thing!! The frame is light enough that he can easily pedal, but is also very sturdy. He is almost 4am tall and there is still room for him to grow. If you are looking for a birthday gift, this is a great way to go! Also, very easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Cammarano

customer_reviews.title: Very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 yr old son and he rides it all the time! Very easy to put together and very durable. 6 and 7 yr olds girls have played with it too and love it just as much my son.
customer_reviews.author: cary

customer_reviews.title: Great car
customer_reviews.text: My 2 and 4 year old live it. Only small issue was decals did not go on easy had to use adhesive

customer_reviews.title: Great gocart
customer_reviews.text: My son received this for Christmas and he loves it. We've had some issues with the front falling off, but it doesnt stop him.

customer_reviews.text: Great and exactly as described. Easy to assemble, and I love the fact that it makes my son exercise when we go outside and play. Much better than those electric carts.

customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool batmobile car but the plastic part on the front pops off every once in a while. Other than that the kid loves it.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT gift for active kid!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best birthday gifts we have EVER purchased for any of our three children. Easy to assemble, seems to be very sturdy.. and I cannot get my four year old off of this thing. He wants to ride it everyday.Great turning radius. The plastic piece on the front that resembles the batmobile can pop off, but pops back on easily.
customer_reviews.author: J. Whitlock

product_meta.title: Hauck Batmobile Pedal Go Kart
product_meta.description: Ultimate pedal power go Kart for dark Gotham streets! Hauck's Batmobile features a sturdy steel tube frame with low-profile rubber wheels, forward & reverse sprocket with an adjustable seat. Designed for little heroes aged 4 and over. Its low weight and sporty design make it a true fun-mobile. As well as training their strength, stamina and reactions, this go-kart is also a fun way for children to learn their first traffic regulations and even parallel parking. To control the speed of the go-kart even on bends, the easy-to-use handbrake works on both back wheels, making it as safe as possible. The bucket seat can be adjusted to the length of the child’s leg and it has a comfortable backrest. Perfect go Kart for crime fighters everywhere!! Go Kart is 44 x 21 x 22". Holds up to 120 lbs.
feature_bullets: Sporty 3 point steering for responsive, quick steering.
Adjustable bucket seat for multiple height kids.
Race styled pedals with rubber wheels & 8 ball style brake for better grip and smooth ride.
Front cover panel in hero design.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
